item.title: Javascript runtime là gì ?
item.description: Javascript runtime environment A javascript runtime is an environment which provides all the necessary components in order to use and run a javascript program. Js code may be executed in one of two runtime enviroments: The runtime environment of a browser (like chrome or firefox) The Node runtime environment.   where do js code is executed ? how it works ?
